name: Creating Email Lead Genneration Campaigns
description: Building targeted email campaigns to attract potential customers and grow your leads.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Create an email lead generation campaign based on information {{goal}} {{target_audience}} {{subject_line}} {{email_offer}} {{CTA}} {{brand_guidelines}}
Ensure the email is catchy, creative and engaging.

CTA.title: Call to Action (CTA)
CTA.description: Include a clear and strong call to action button that tells recipients what to do next (e.g., "Download Now!", "Sign Up for Free").

goal.title: Campaign Goal
goal.description: Briefly describe what you want to achieve with this campaign (e.g., generate leads for a free trial, promote a new product launch).

ui_metadata.value: Generate leads for a free 14-day trial of our new project management software.

email_offer.title: Email Offer
email_offer.description: Highlight the incentive or value proposition for subscribing or engaging with your offer (e.g., free ebook, discount code, exclusive content).

ui_metadata.value: Unlock the power of streamlined project management with a free 14-day trial. Get organized, boost team collaboration, and meet deadlines with ease!

subject_line.title: Email Subject Line
subject_line.description: Craft a catchy subject line that grabs attention and entices recipients to open the email.

target_audience.title: Target Audience
target_audience.description: Identify the ideal audience you want to reach with your campaign (e.g., demographics, interests, pain points).

ui_metadata.value: Small business owners (10-50 employees) in the creative industry who are struggling to manage multiple projects and deadlines.

brand_guidelines.title: Brand Guidelines (Optional)
brand_guidelines.description: If you have branding guidelines, include your logo and color scheme for consistency.
